content.question: A researcher is interested in studying extraversion. They plan to give students from a local college a questionnaire and observe them interacting with others in different classrooms for two weeks. Which of the following might be a possible confounding variable in this study?

choices.label: The grade point averages of the participants

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
